name: Kelowna Rock: Climbing
description: Go climbing in Kelowna: sport climbing, trad climbing, ice climbing, dry tooling and bouldering. It's all in here! Includes over 400 routes and boulders in the KLO Creek, Boulderfields, Lonely Crags, Mt. Boucherie, Cedar Mountain/The Lair, Christie Falls and Deeper Creek areas. You'll also find detailed maps, topos and approach beta to get you to the climbs.
